segments.text: We're thinking of ordering fifty refrigerators . But , there's one problem .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's that ? I thought our negotiation went very well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The only problem is the price . It's not possible for us to make any sales at this price .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: $ 1500 is almost the lowest price we can offer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid I can't agree with you there . Your price is much higher than other companies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You get what you pay for , considering the high quality , our price is very reasonable .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't deny that the refrigerator is of top quality . If you could go a little lower , we'll place the order right away .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , I can't give you an immediate answer for this problem , let me talk to our general manager first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , we'll wait for your answer .
segments.speaker: S1
